description: This file defines a UI component named 'NotesList' using the LightningJS framework. It manages note items, displays a list of notes via 'NoteCard' components, and handles user interactions like selecting and deleting notes. It also includes empty state UI when there are no notes.

classes.name: NotesList
classes.description: A LightningJS component that renders a list of note cards and handles user interactions related to notes.

methods.name: onSelect
methods.description: Emits a 'select' event with the note as payload to the parent component.

methods.name: onDelete
methods.description: Emits a 'delete' event with the note as payload to the parent component.

methods.name: $onSelect
methods.description: Wrapper method that calls 'onSelect' to handle selection events from child components.

methods.name: $onDelete
methods.description: Wrapper method that calls 'onDelete' to handle delete events from child components.
